Shout of Challenge.name: Shout of Challenge
Shout of Challenge.flavor: You attack with a fierce war cry, challenging your foe and giving heart to your nearby comrades.
Shout of Challenge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 3 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.
Shout of Challenge.effect: If the target is bloodied, you mark it until the end of your next turn.

Inspiring Blade.name: Inspiring Blade
Inspiring Blade.flavor: A dazzling display of swordplay and a bold challenge to your enemies inspires your allies to follow your example and battle on with renewed vigor.
Inspiring Blade.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Inspiring Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Inspiring Blade.effect: One ally within 10 squares of you regains the use of an expended encounter attack power. In addition, for each use of inspiring word you have expended during this encounter, one additional ally within 10 squares of you regains the use of an expended encounter attack power.

Heart of Dragons.trigger: You or an ally within 5 squares of you is bloodied by an enemy attack
Heart of Dragons.target: The triggering character in the burst
Heart of Dragons.effect: The target can make a saving throw and also gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.
